name: StRoseHighSchool
0:
”Alexa, Open Saint Rose”
”Alexa, Launch Saint Rose”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: saint rose
Developer Terms of Use
des:
St. Rose High School's Official Alexa Skill. Ask questions about admissions, weather, events, donations, dining, campus ministry, Athletics and much more. See the sample following questions:

Try asking:
* Alexa, ask St. Rose to play the school prayer.

---- Weather ----
This feature allows you to hear the weather forecast for the St. Rose High School campus and our Athletic Fields.

Try asking:
* Alexa, ask St. Rose for the weather at the school.
 Alexa, ask St. Rose for the weather at the fields.

---- News ----
This feature allows you to hear the latest updates from the Newsstand and find out what exciting things are happening at St. Rose.

Try asking:
* Alexa, ask St. Rose for news.

---- Events ----
This feature allows you to find out about events happening on St. Rose High School’s campus.

Try asking:
* Alexa, ask St. Rose what is happening on [time period]?

When you make your request, fill in the following:
* time period: The time period to search for events in. (ex. today, tomorrow, Wednesday, Friday, next Monday, this week, etc.)

---- Frequently Asked Questions ----
This feature allows you to ask questions about Admissions, Athletics, Campus Ministry, Student Life, Upcoming Events, Fundraising, Alumni Relations, Technology, Library Services, Health Services, Dining Services and so much more. Here are some sample questions:

**SAMPLE QUESTIONS TO FOLLOW**

We want to hear what you think and most importantly, the features you’d like us to build next. You can leave feedback at help@srhsnj.com or go to http://srhsnj.com/alexa for the latest on this Alexa Skill.
